Author: vixcoretoken
Title: VIXCORE - The future gaming and gambling tokens
Body: VIXCORE TOKEN Decentralize Token Currency for Gambling and Online Gaming Application with own exchange platform   After several years of observing and learning about crypto currencies finally Vixcore Token was born. Vixcore was made to help gaming companies and gambling apps and platform to have an easy access and friendly to use token as their in game currency. The concept is very simple, we are proposing our token to local gaming apps and online gaming to be their primary currency, so far we have already partners who are committed to part of our plans.  Company Information  Official Website Vixcore Exchange Telegram Channel Telegram Group Twitter  More About Vixcore Tokens Vixcore White Paper  Most of our devs team are korean citizen and well experienced in cyrpto related business Vixcore Token is created to support online gambling application and platforms as their in game currency We have clear vision of our road maps and dev team are visible in our website We have different partners already and waiting to acquire our tokens after ico We have our own exchange platforms We are developing gaming apps empowered by vxcr token We have limited supply and we are on the go for listing in high end exchange platforms  How to Join our pre sale selfdrop? To Join our selfdrop click the link below Selfdrop  We have total supply of 10,000,000,000 Vxcr. 50% of it are intended for ICO ( Selfdrop, bounties and airdrop). We have 3 rounds selfdrop where everyone can participate in early bird price.  Check out the round breakdown below: Round   Supply   Value Round 1   2,500,000,000 VXCR   0.01 eth = 50,000 VXCR Round 2   1,500,000,000 VXCR   0.01 eth = 40,000 VXCR Round 3   1,000,000,000 VXCR   0.01 eth = 30,000 VXCR   For more information please read our road maps by visiting our website

Author: fauzan34
Title: VIXCORE - The future gaming and gambling tokens
Body: Vixcore aims to be the leading betting currency and core medium for exchange of betting platforms, VXCR, an ERC20 token built on the Ethereum blockchain, will be the unit of exchange within our affiliated network of betting platforms.
